comments:
I have no idea if this is a plugin issue (Dejan) or a Core issue

F1 on XP
create a directory with Unicode Char (Japanese, or whatever)[i.e c:\רגפ]
Open UpdateManager
in FeatureUpdate right click, new->Site Bookmark
Type any name
type the url http://dejan.torolab.ibm.com/testSite/site.xml
Click Ok
expand created bookmark
open the local view pop up (feature updates)
uncheck Show Matching features Only
Select RedDot 2.0.0
in Preview view, click Install
Click Next, click accept, Next
in location select the UNICODE path
Click Next, install, restart when asked
In Eclipse, Open window->Customize Perspective
Expand Others, select RedDot, Check the check box
a red button appears on the tollbar
Click on it, you will get an error message + this in the log


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 五月 22, 2002 08:58:27.212

Unable to reproduce with F2 and Japanese XP.  Clicking the red dot after 
following all steps is successful.  Christophe, can you still reproduce this?

Closing.
Please re-open if this is still a problem for you in the latest builds.
